WOTD bot.brief: Auto-send the word of the day
WOTD bot.desc: Check every 24hrs for the word of the day from whatever that app I use it called, do they have a python API? Lame if they dont.
WOTD bot.author: Toaster

lights.brief: Bot commands to turn toaster's lights on and off (and such)
lights.author: Toaster

string recall system.desc: system that allows for users to input strings of any length, give them a name, then fetch them later. useful for preserving lists and links without filling pins.
string recall system.author: crows

tweets.desc: automatically fetches and posts all tweets from a set twitter user. should allow for toggling retweets, quotes, replies, etc.
tweets.author: crows

alerts.desc: pings users at an inputted time with a custom message
alerts.author: crows

coins.desc: fake currency system used by bot for various systems. possibly earned via level-up (see levelling).
coins.author: crows

random quoter.brief: takes a random message from the server and quotes it
random quoter.author: JONKKKK

gacha.desc: allows users to play a gacha game using coins and tracks what they've pulled in the past. possibly illegal?
gacha.author: crows

mute.desc: maybe make this use the ac/roll thing like in <#680075322884096026> , could be kinda funny. plus, if you've talked a ton and get muted, you can still kinda send messages
mute.author: crows

Paginated Help.desc: Like with some other bots where you can change help pages or categories by reacting.
Paginated Help.author: Alterae

polls.desc: steal all functionality from reactor on the last server
polls.author: GoldenPot8o

color bot functionality.brief: add the color bot code into this bot
color bot functionality.desc: it makes sense because we already have color stuff
color bot functionality.author: JONKKKK

file editing.brief: edit the bots code from discord (this is stupid)
file editing.desc: stuff like 2m.showlines [file] [lines from file to show] and 2m.editline [file] [line] [what to edit it to be]. why would you make this
file editing.author: Toaster
